content: जर्जर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [जर्ज्-बा° अर] {@--1@} Old, infirm, decayed. {@--2@} Worn out, torn, shattered, broken to pieces, divided in parts, split up into thin particles; जराजर्जरितविषाणकोटयो मृगाः <ls>K. 21</ls>; गात्रं जराजर्जरितं विहाय <ls>Mv. 7. 18</ls>; विसर्पन् धाराभिर्लुठति धरणीं जर्जरकणः <ls>U. 1. 29</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 23</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 16.</ls> {@--3@} Wounded, hurt. {@--4@} Pained, tormented; <ls>Māl. 9. 53.</ls> {@--5@} Dull, hollow (as the sound of a broken vessel). --रं {@--1@} The banner of Indra. {@--2@} Moss.
